timeline.title: bvblogic
timeline.description:
Starded working at bvblogic as Web Developer. I build websites on PHP programming language, using frameworks such as Laravel, Kohana, Codeigniter, Yii. Also I used CSS3, HTML5, jQuery and Bootstrap for frontend.
First expirience of building and supporting comercial projects.
